title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first try in library outline view.
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the selection does not work on the first try. 

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view for the first time.

Observed Behavior:
- The item is not selected on the first try.

Expected Behavior:
- The item should be selected on the first try.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Click on any item in the view for the first time.

Upon performing the above steps, the item should be selected on the first try. If the issue persists, repeat step 2 for confirmation.
